languages.text: "Брат Сумерки, я не солгал — час, что был тебе обещан, пришел. Тебе воистину уготована особая роль". {n}Темный Апостол устремляет взгляд на вас и улыбается. Вы чувствуете как в вашей груди начинает что-то пульсировать — темная воля, впитавшаяся в вас вместе с обломками меча, тянется к сердцу Кунрада.{/n}

"I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Брат Сумерки, я не солгал — час, что был тебе обещан, пришел. Тебе воистину уготована особая роль". {n}Темный Апостол устремляет взгляд на вас и улыбается. Вы чувствуете как в вашей груди начинает что-то пульсировать — темная воля, впитавшаяся в вас вместе с обломками меча, тянется к сердцу Кунрада.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You really do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel the blade shard throbbing in your hand as the dark will contained in it seeks to reach Kunrad's heart.{/n}

"I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You really do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel the blade shard throbbing in your hand as the dark will contained in it seeks to reach Kunrad's heart.{/n}

"I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You really do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel the blade shard throbbing in your hand as the dark will contained in it seeks to reach Kunrad's heart.{/n}

"I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

"I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

languages.text: “我并没有说谎，暮光兄弟。我承诺过的时刻已经到来，而你此刻确实要扮演重要的角色。”{n}乌拉隆将目光转向你，露出了微笑。你感觉胸口一阵悸动，与利刃碎片合而为一的黑暗意志渴求着昆拉德的心脏。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我并没有说谎，暮光兄弟。我承诺过的时刻已经到来，而你此刻确实要扮演重要的角色。”{n}乌拉隆将目光转向你，露出了微笑。你感觉胸口一阵悸动，与利刃碎片合而为一的黑暗意志渴求着昆拉德的心脏。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht gelogen, Bruder Zwielicht: Die Stunde, die Euch versprochen wurde, ist gekommen. Ihr habt in der Tat eine ganz besondere Rolle zu spielen." {n}Der Dunkle Apostel richtet seinen Blick auf dich und lächelt. Du spürst ein Pochen in deiner Brust, als der dunkle Wille, den du mit den Splittern der Klinge absorbiert hast, nach Kunrads Herz greift.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht gelogen, Bruder Zwielicht: Die Stunde, die Euch versprochen wurde, ist gekommen. Ihr habt wirklich eine ganz besondere Rolle zu spielen." {n}Der Dunkle Apostel richtet seinen Blick auf dich und lächelt. Du spürst den Klingensplitter in deiner Hand pochen, als der dunkle Wille darin sich danach sehnt, Kunrads Herz zu erreichen.{/n}

languages.text: «Y no te mentí, hermano Crepúsculo: la hora que te fue prometida ha llegado. Tienes que desempeñar una labor muy especial». {n}El Apóstol Oscuro desvía su mirada hacia ti y sonríe. Notas que tu pecho palpita cuando la siniestra voluntad que has absorbido junto con los fragmentos de la espada se alarga hacia el corazón de Kunrad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y no te mentí, hermano Crepúsculo: la hora que te fue prometida ha llegado. Tienes que desempeñar una labor muy especial». {n}El Apóstol Oscuro desvía su mirada hacia ti y sonríe. Notas que tu pecho palpita cuando la siniestra voluntad que has absorbido junto con los fragmentos de la espada se alarga hacia el corazón de Kunrad.{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas menti, frère Crépuscule : le moment qui vous avait été promis est arrivé. Vous avez bel et bien un rôle particulier à jouer. » {n}L'Apôtre Noir se tourne vers vous en souriant. Vous sentez comme des palpitations dans votre poitrine alors que la sombre volonté absorbée avec les fragments de lame cherche à atteindre le cœur de Kunrad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas menti, frère Crépuscule : le moment qui vous avait été promis est arrivé. Vous avez bel et bien un rôle particulier à jouer. » {n}L'Apôtre Noir se tourne vers vous en souriant. Vous sentez comme des palpitations dans votre poitrine alors que la sombre volonté absorbée avec les fragments de lame cherche à atteindre le cœur de Kunrad.{/n}

languages.text: 「嘘はついていないぞ、薄明の兄弟よ。約束の時が来たのだ。お前は本当に特別な役割を担っている」{n}ダークアポスルは視線をあなたに向け、微笑む。あなたは胸が高鳴るのを感じる。刃のかけらとともに吸収した闇の意志が、クンラッドの心臓を求めているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「嘘はついていないぞ、薄明の兄弟よ。約束の時が来たのだ。お前は本当に特別な役割を担っている」{n}ダークアポスルは視線をあなたに向け、微笑む。あなたは胸が高鳴るのを感じる。刃のかけらとともに吸収した闇の意志が、クンラッドの心臓を求めているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Rahip Seher, ben yalan söylemedim. Sana vadedilen vakit gelmiştir. Sahiden de mühim bir rol oynayacaksın." {n}Kara Apotr, gözlerini sana çevirip gülümsüyor. Bıçak kırıklarıyla birlikte emdiğin o kara irade Kunrad'ın kalbine uzanırken bağrına bir şey saplanır gibi oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I did not lie, Brother Twilight: the hour that was promised to you has come. You truly do have a special part to play." {n}The Dark Apostle turns his gaze toward you and smiles. You feel a throbbing in your chest as the dark will that you have absorbed along with the blade shards reaches for Kunrad's heart.{/n}
